events.description: The ECB is expected to leave interest rates unchanged.

facts.fact_text: Germany's 10-year Bund yield was little changed at 2.87%.

evidences.evidence_text: Germany’s 10-year Bund yield was little changed at 2.87%

facts.fact_text: Germany plans to raise a record €512 billion this year to finance infrastructure upgrades and increased defense spending.

evidences.evidence_text: Germany plans to raise a record €512 billion this year to finance infrastructure upgrades and increased defense spending.

facts.fact_text: Eurozone inflation cooled sharply in January, with headline CPI easing to 1.7%, the lowest since September 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: Recent data showed eurozone inflation cooled sharply in January, with headline CPI easing to 1.7%, the lowest since September 2024

facts.fact_text: Eurozone core inflation unexpectedly fell to 2.2%, its lowest level since October 2021.

evidences.evidence_text: and core inflation unexpectedly falling to 2.2%, its lowest level since October 2021.

claims.claim_text: ECB President Christine Lagarde is expected to reiterate that policy remains in a “good place,” with markets pricing in steady rates through 2026.
claims.author: Christine Lagarde

evidences.evidence_text: ECB President Christine Lagarde is expected to reiterate that policy remains in a “good place,” with markets pricing in steady rates through 2026.

evidence.evidence_text: as investors awaited the ECB’s policy decision later today

Recent data showed eurozone inflation cooled sharply in January, with headline CPI easing to 1.7%, the lowest since September 2024, and core inflation unexpectedly falling to 2.2%, its lowest level since October 2021.
Germany plans to raise a record €512 billion this year to finance infrastructure upgrades and increased defense spending.
